start.name: start
start.hello: Hello, {0.first_name}! This bot is created to organize the process of streaming in out project. Here you can sign, when you start streaming and some other moves. To start work, enter the commands using /. Good luck!

new.name: new
new.enter_time_beg: Enter the time, when you plan to start streaming in format: 12:25
new.enter_time_end: Enter the time, when you plan to finish streaming in format: 12:25
new.cant_be_later:
End time can't be later, than begin!
Enter right time:

delete.name: delete
delete.enter_time_delete: Enter the date in format 2021/11/25-12:25 of sign, which you want to delete

today.name: today
today.no_streams_for_today: You have no streams for today!

stat.name: stat
stat.pattern: Statistics {}. For month: {} hours. All time {} hours.

timetable.name: timetable
timetable.choose_pattern: Choose the time interval for which you want to register:
timetable.choose_days_of_week: Choose the days of week on which You are going to stream on the next week:
timetable.time_beg_table: Enter time which you want to stream in the chosen day in format 12:25
